name: highland
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in or relating to an area with mountains or hills: Much of central and eastern Brazil is highland plateau. highland springs
(also Highland) in or relating to the Scottish Highlands (= a mountainous area in the north of Scotland): The groom wore Highland dress tartan. He took a trip to the highland games at Braemar in Scotland. a Highland reel (= a dance) Related word
highlands
More examplesFewer examplesThe couple met as teenagers in the highland village of Soloma.Melting ice thunders along highland valleys in a torrent of mud and rock.A huge painting of highland cattle hangs on the wall.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Towns & regions: named regions of countries
an area in the north of Scotland that was one of nine local government regions until 1996 and is now a council area (= an area with its own local government): In Highland, some 83% of the funding of the council is from the Scottish Executive. Officials from the Highland Council have been working closely with local communities.
More examplesFewer examplesEight councils, including Glasgow, Highland, and Fife, recycled below 5%. Inverness, 34 miles away, is the administrative capital of the Highland region.He said the fuel tax was damaging the Highland economy.

A Highland cow is a type of cow, originally bred in Scotland, that has long, thick, brown hair and large horns, and is kept for its meat: The children loved the farm's Highland cows. Herds of shaggy Highland cattle graze in the valley. a Highland bull
BrianAJackson/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe white beaches are empty except perhaps for a stray shaggy-haired Highland cow.Highland cattle graze in the fields.Black was the original dominant colour of the Highland herds before selective breeding was introduced.
